subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Texas A&M quarterback Johnny Manziel was suspended for the first half of Saturday’s game against Rice, but the N.C.A.A. said there was no evidence he had received money in exchange for autographs.
snippet: Texas A&M quarterback Johnny Manziel was suspended for the first half of Saturday’s game against Rice, but the N.C.A.A. said there was no evidence he had received money in exchange for autographs.
